answers.answer: I had one yesterday. I had to sit on a reclining table and push a button when the baby moved. They strap a monitor to your belly and record the heart rate. I have another one scheduled for tomorrow.  I am overdue and that is the reason for mine.

They are Non Stress tests to make sure the baby's heart beat increases when he or she moves. You will be relaxed in a recliner and have to push a button anytime the baby moves. I had them for the last 4 weeks because I have gestational diabetes. I have my csection tomorrow morning.
